source_reference.text: Best of 2021: Identifying Triggers In Your Marriage - Guy and Amber Lia (Video by Focus on the Family)

content_summary:
They were both convinced they had married the wrong person. From almost the very beginning of their marriage, Amber and Guy Lia experienced various tensions and personality clashes related to house cleaning, backseat driving, workaholism, and intimacy. In this two-day Focus on the Family broadcast, Amber and Guy discuss how they bravely faced the triggers head-on, and committed to working on their own relationships with Jesus. As you listen to the Lia’s story, you’ll feel hope that you, too, can see real marriage transformation!

Get the Lia's book, Marriage Triggers: https://bit.ly/3DfClCt

For more resources on this topic: https://bit.ly/3EBaxtP
